Title: Relates to claims for mental injury premised upon extraordinary work-related stress incurred at work
Summary: Relates to claims for mental injury premised upon extraordinary work-related stress incurred at work; applies to all workers.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to claims for mental injury premised upon extraordinary work-related stress
